Description:
Detects modifications to an RDS cluster or its deletion, which may indicate potential data exfiltration attempts, unauthorized access, or exposure of sensitive information.

Author: Ivan Saakov
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Modification or Deletion of an AWS RDS Cluster
Query: sourcetype='aws-cloudtrail' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'rds.amazonaws.com' and (eventname = 'modifydbcluster' or eventname = 'deletedbcluster')
